issue.title: [C++][CMake] Add support for x64 for CMAKE_SYSTEM_PROCESSOR
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18260](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18260). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
vcpkg uses `x64`:

https://vcpkg.readthedocs.io/en/latest/users/triplets/

> Valid options are x86, x64, arm, arm64 and wasm32.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18260?focusedCommentId=17630179) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 14598
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14598>
